title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - May 13, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - May 13, 2021
description:
Gary and Mark discuss the breaking news in the trial of the other three officers in the George Floyd case, explore the implications surrounding where Trump is living if an indictment is handed down agains him and hear a clip from a judge who suffers no fools.

Watch the show on YouTube exclusively at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and be sure to subscribe as well
